attributes.action: Means test the ACA, if Christopher Kelley doesn't come up with it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ACA is supposed to be a subsistence allowance so that individuals are able to do their job. When you've got people using it to feather their own nests, that makes about as much sense as a 75 year old man claiming maternity allowance.

I propose that, like any other form of benefit, the ACA becomes means tested and becomes what it should be; a way to incentivise those from poorer backgrounds to join without financially suffering.

Anyone earning more than their ministerial salary through any means (investments, after dinner speaking, consultancy, owning their own business)should have their ACA reduced accordingly.
